_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

Examples of how diligence is the best of: All skillful qualities are rooted in diligence and meet at diligence.
Diligence is said to be the best of them.
Examples of things that are said to be t: An elephant’s footprint is said to be the biggest of them all.
The peak is said to be the topmost of them all.
Spikenard is said to be the best of all kinds of fragrant root.
Red sandalwood is said to be the best of all kinds of fragrant heartwood.
Jasmine is said to be the best of all kinds of fragrant flower.
The wheel-turning monarch is said to be the foremost of all kings.
The moon’s radiance is said to be the best of all radiance of stars.
The ocean is said to be the greatest of all rivers.
The description of the sun dispelling da: After the rainy season, the sky is clear and cloudless.
When the sun rises, it dispels all the darkness from the sky as it shines and glows and radiates.
